name: The Cube Factory PlayTest
description:
This is a playtest

There are some bugs in here for example the collision on Test 1 allows bullets to pass through them but Test 1 is just a visual test. Test 2 is a gameplay test. Mostly Id like feedback on the movement and how it feels to play and shoot. Any feedback you can give me would be great! the game is also on steam for free if youd like to play through the current build of the game thats available. Thank you for your time!



Controls

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

E - Interact

Shift - Dash

Hold Spacebar Against Orange Wall - Wall Running

Left Mouse Button - Fire Gun

Right Mouse Button - Fire SP Blast

Esc - Opens Menu

Wall Running Explained - If you hold down spacebar against an orange wall you will run along the wall until you let go or jump off, you regain your jump when you touch the orange walls.

Dash Explained - The dash uses the momentum you have so if you jump and dash at the same time you'll jump extra high but if you dash while falling you'll dash downward. You can play with the momentum of your dash to do interesting things.

Bounce Pads spend your jumps but you can dash with them to gain extra height or distance if done correctly
